snippet.title: Guild of Ascension - Trailer
snippet.description:
→→Wishlist us on Steam←←
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1169520/Guild_of_Ascension/

Guild of Ascension is a mix of turn-based tactics and real-time gameplay, where your turns are short burst of action-packed combat. Plan ahead, learn strategies, unleash powerful chain reactions, but do not wait around to long, as the clock never stop ticking during your Ascension.
